verses.verse: The <S%G4413>former<s%> <S%G3056>treatise<s%> have I <S%G4160>made<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G2321>Theophilus<s%>, <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%>,

<S%G891>Until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> he was taken <S%G353>up<s%>, after that <S%G1781>he<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> had given <S%G1781>commandments<s%> to the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1586>chosen<s%>:

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G3936>showed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3958>passion<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> infallible <S%G5039>proofs<s%>, being <S%G3700>seen<s%> <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>speaking<s%> of the things pertaining <S%G4012>to<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%>, being assembled <S%G4871>together<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3853>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> that they <S%G5563>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5563>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> wait <S%G4037>for<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%>, said <S%G191>he<s%>, you have heard of <S%G3450>me<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with <S%G5204>water<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3778>hence<s%>.

When <S%G4905>they<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> had come <S%G4905>together<s%>, they <S%G1905>asked<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1487>will<s%> <S%G600>you<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> restore <S%G600>again<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1097>It<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> for <S%G5216>you<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G2540>seasons<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> you shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G1904>after<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G1904>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> you shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2449>Jud√¶a<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G4540>Samaria<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G2078>outermost<s%> part of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, while they <S%G991>looked<s%>, <S%G846>he<s%> was taken <S%G1869>up<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G5274>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>sight<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5613%G99999>while<s%> they looked <S%G816>steadfastly<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G4198>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> went <S%G2532>up<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2066>apparel<s%>;

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G1057>Galilee<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> gazing <S%G1689>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>? This <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, which is taken <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2064>shall<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> in like <S%G5158>manner<s%> <S%G3739>as<s%> you have <S%G2300>seen<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G5290>they<s%> returned <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1638>Olivet<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1451>from<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> a sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>'s <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3598>journey<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G2258>had<s%> come <S%G1525>in<s%>, they went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a upper <S%G5253>room<s%>, <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G2650>stayed<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%>, <S%G5376>Philip<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%>, <S%G918>Bartholomew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew<s%>, <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G256>Alphaeus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2207>Zelotes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> the brother of <S%G2385>James<s%>.

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3956%G99999>all<s%> <S%G4342>continued<s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>supplication<s%>, <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1135>women<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3778>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, (the <S%G3793>number<s%> of <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G1909%G99999>together<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> a <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%>,)

<S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1124>scripture<s%> must <S%G1163>needs<s%> have been <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> spoke <S%G4277>before<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%>, which <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3595>guide<s%> to them that <S%G4815>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2674>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2674>numbered<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G2975>obtained<s%> <S%G2819>part<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%>.

<S%G3767>Now<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2932>purchased<s%> a <S%G5564>field<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G3408>reward<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>falling<s%> <S%G4248>headlong<s%>, he burst <S%G2997>asunder<s%> in the <S%G3319>midst<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4698>bowels<s%> gushed <S%G1632>out<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2730>dwellers<s%> at <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>; so much <S%G5620>as<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5564>field<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G1258>tongue<s%>, <S%G184>Aceldama<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> is to <S%G2076>say<s%>, The <S%G5564>field<s%> of <S%G129>blood<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G5568>Psalms<s%>, <S%G1096>Let<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1886>habitation<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G2048>desolate<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2077>let<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> man <S%G2730>live<s%> in <S%G846>it<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1984>office<s%> <S%G2983>let<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> of these <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> have <S%G4905>accompanied<s%> <S%G2254%G99999>us<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5550%G99999>time<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>,

<S%G756>Beginning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G2193>to<s%> that <S%G3739>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he was taken <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G1096>must<s%> <S%G1520%G99999>one<s%> be ordained to <S%G1096>be<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2476>appointed<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%>, <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G923>Barsabas<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G2459>Justus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3159>Matthias<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G4336>prayed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G4771>You<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, which know the <S%G2589>hearts<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G322>men<s%>, show <S%G3739%G99999>which<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> you have <S%G1586>chosen<s%>,

That he may <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G2819>part<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G651>apostleship<s%>, <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> by <S%G3845>transgression<s%> <S%G4198>fell<s%>, that he might go <S%G1519>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they gave <S%G1325>forth<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2819>lots<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2819>lot<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3159>Matthias<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he was <S%G4785>numbered<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%>.
